description: These pretty little appetisers taste as delicious as they look, and can be prepared well in advance.
name: Mini Naan Toasts With Roasted Vegetables & Goat’s Cheese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs olive oil (plus extra if needed)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C (Gas 6). Put the eggplant, red capsicum, courgette, and onion in a large roasting tin in a single layer. Toss with the olive oil and season.
Cook for 20 minutes, turning after 15 minutes, until soft and charred at the edges. Set aside to cool, adding 1/2 tbs of oil if they look dry. Check the seasoning.
Meanwhile, cut the naan breads into small circles using a 4cm round cutter and put on a baking tray. Cook for 10-15 minutes until golden brown and crispy. Set aside to cool.

In a bowl, beat the goat’s cheese, cream cheese, and basil, and season well. When ready to serve, spread each piece of bread with a little herby goat’s cheese and top with 1 tsp of vegetables, pressing down slightly so the vegetables stick to the cheese.
